metaTags.keywords: The best web developer, the best SEO Expert in bangladesh
metaTags.author: Tanvir Abid

caption.title: Professional Web Designer & Developer
caption.description: Meet a professional web designer and developer. With a passion for creating visually appealing and functional websites, our owner brings expertise to every project.

caption.title: Web Designer and Developer
caption.description: Explore our services in web design and development. We specialize in crafting modern and responsive websites that enhance user experience and meet your business goals.

caption.title: Professional SEO Expert
caption.description: Boost your online presence with our professional SEO services. Our owner is an expert in search engine optimization, ensuring your website ranks high and attracts the right audience.

texts: In a charming village along a meandering river, lived Tanvir Abid, a diligent dreamer. With insatiable curiosity, he delved into history and geopolitics, honing linguistic skills and TESOL expertise. Abid's journey extended into technology, where he became the village's best web developer, mastering code and optimizing digital landscapes as the best SEO expert. His excellence led him from Germany to Bangladesh, shaping data with precision.

Amidst tech pursuits, Abid found solace in chess, embodying strategic prowess in life and work. A love for storytelling drew him to documentaries, unraveling the world's mysteries through each historical frame.

As the sun sets, Abid joyfully connects with new souls, traversing the globe to absorb diverse cultures. His heart beats with passion for learning, dedication to excellence, and a spirit that leaves an indelible mark. Abid, the village's best web developer and SEO expert, weaves a tale of brilliance and global exploration, crafting a legacy as a masterful coder and a seeker of knowledge.

services.name: SEO Audit
services.synopsis: Comprehensive audit to identify strengths, weaknesses, and opportunities for SEO improvement.

services.name: On-Page SEO
services.synopsis: Implementing on-page SEO strategies to improve the relevance and visibility of your web pages.

services.synopsis: In-depth research to discover relevant keywords and niches for better SEO targeting.

services.synopsis: Crafting engaging and optimized content to enhance your website’s SEO performance.

projects.title: Convertify Unit And Number Base Converter
projects.description: Convertify facilitates seamless unit conversions (length, mass, volume, speed) and numeral base transformations. Features dynamic HTML generation and accurate conversion algorithms.

projects.title: Sudoku Game
projects.description: Interactive and engaging Sudoku game – test your logic and problem-solving skills with varying difficulty levels. Enjoy daily challenges, multiplayer mode, and an ad-free experience. Play anytime, anywhere on mobile or desktop. Let's master Sudoku together!

education.degree: M.A. in Applied Linguistics and TESOL
education.subject: Applied Linguistics and TESOL
activity: Completed Research Methods for ELL and Teaching course
Conducted survey and interview for Need Analysis
Designed a syllabus for business English
Conducted demo classes in English Language Learning and Teaching
Conducted demo classes in Teaching Practicum and Classroom Management
Completed Thesis on online assessment using mixed methods

responsibilities: Cleaned research data by mixing necessary codes.
Product identification analyzing the market and marking off the competitors.
Keyword research to find consumers’ interest.
Writing content, categorizing, and optimizing the keywords.
Creating clickbait title maintaining the URL specification.
Dealt with various clients from different countries independently.
Created logic to function web applications using JavaScript and jQuery.
Researched, designed, and implemented functions for identifying, extracting, analyzing, and retrieving traffic behavior.
Tested troubleshooting methods and devised innovative solutions.
Conducted regression testing, analyzed results, and made observations.
Gathered data on integration issues and vulnerabilities.
Maintained proper decorum and adhered to a strict schedule.
